post.descOne: Your initial deposit has been received and transferred to your new account. Your account is now active!
post.descTwo: A portion of your deposit has been reserved to cover the cost of hosting your account .
post.title: Your account has been activated.

pre.desc: To begin using NEAR Wallet, make a minimum initial deposit by sending at least $ {amount} to your Account ID (sometimes called an“ address ”).
pre.title: Almost there! Make your initial deposit.

available.implicitAccountModal: Please double check your username, especially if it is an exchange account. If you enter an incorrect username, you will permanently lose your funds.

create.errorAccountNotExist: An error occurred while creating your account. Please try again.
create.errorInvalidAccountIdLength: Username must be between 2 and 64 characters.

post.descOne: Your initial deposit was received! Once claimed, your deposit will be transferred to your new account.
post.descTwo: Important: Your single-use funding address will no longer be valid. Make sure to replace it with your Account ID on any exchanges or other devices where it may have been saved.

modal.descOne: By continuing, you acknowledge that the single-use funding address will be replaced, and any additional funds sent to the old address will be lost.
modal.descTwo: Remember to replace it with your Account ID on any exchanges or other devices where it may have been saved.
modal.title: Update your address

post.title: Claim your account

pre.descOne: Initialize your account by sending at least $ {amount} to the one-time recharge address below.

success.descOne: Congratulations, $ {accountId} ! Your account has been successfully created.

success.descTwo: You must use this account for all NEAR transactions.

details.warning: This will allow access to your wallet. Please proceed with caution!

authorizedApps.dashboardNoApps: You have not authorized any applications

availableBalanceInfo: Your spendable NEAR balance excluding funds locked or staked. View Balance Breakdown →
availableBalanceProfile: This is your expendable balance in NEAR and can be immediately spent or transferred. This value is lower than your total balance.

header.confirm: Please confirm the operation on your device ...

confirmLedgerModal.one: You will need to verify the login information on your Ledger device.

invalidLinkDrop.one: The NEAR Drop link has already been activated.

invalidLinkDrop.two: The NEAR Drop link can be used to create one account, after which the link will become invalid.

note.canContain: Your username can contain any of the following values:
note.lowercase: Characters (_-) can be used as separators

createAccount.pageText: It doesn't take long to create an account.

termsPage.descOne: NEAR accounts require a minimum balance of at least $ {amount} to hold a place on the network.
termsPage.descTwo: After reserving a unique account address, you'll be asked to make a small initial deposit to activate your account.
termsPage.disclaimer: By creating a NEAR account, you agree to the NEAR Wallet Terms of Service and Privacy Policy .

disclaimer.text: This is a preliminary developer wallet. It should only be used for the NEAR Protocol DevNet. Find out more on the website.

enterAccountNameLedgerModal.one: Enter the name of the account you are logging into

ledger.U2F_4: Ledger device login failed: U2F DEVICE_INELIGIBLE. Please make sure your Ledger device is connected and unlocked.
ledger.U2FNotSupported: U2F support in the browser is required to use the Ledger device. Please use Chrome, Opera or Firefox with the U2F extension. Also make sure you are using an HTTPS connection.

type.LackBalanceForState: Your available balance is too low to take any action on your account. Send NEAR to your account and try again.
type.RetriesExceeded: The maximum number of retries for this transaction has been exceeded.

footer.desc: NEAR is a scalable computing and storage platform that is changing the way the Internet works for the better.

hardwareDevices.desc: Enhance the security of your account with hardware wallets.

disable.desc: Make sure you have other recovery methods enabled, and only then disable the existing recovery method.
disable.title: Are you sure you want to turn off the Ledger?

ledger.connect: Your Ledger is not currently connected. We recommend that you reconnect your Ledger to make sure your account is secure.
ledger.disclaimer: Before disconnecting your Ledger device, you must enable an alternate recovery method.

hardwareDevices.title: Hardware devices

claimAccount.desc: Your deposit was received! Once claimed, your deposit will be transferred to your new account.

disclaimer.desc: Important: The old single-use funding address will no longer be valid. Make sure to replace it with your new address on any exchanges or other devices where it may have been saved.

claimAccount.title: Claim Your Account

creditCard.desc: Complete your purchase of at least $ {amount} NEAR through MoonPay. MoonPay will automatically deposit your funds into your new account.
creditCard.title: Fund your new account using a credit card.

manualDeposit.desc: Meet the minimum initial deposit by sending at least $ {amount} NEAR to the single-use funding address below.
manualDeposit.title: Submit a manual deposit.

accountId.subLabel: The account name must include the top-level account name, for example .near , or be exactly 64 characters.

landing.banner: NEAR Wallet is in Private Beta

ledgerSignTxModal.ADD_ACCESS_KEY: You will need to verify the login information on your Ledger device.
ledgerSignTxModal.ADD_ACCESS_KEY_SEED_PHRASE: You will need to verify the credentials for full access on your Ledger device.
ledgerSignTxModal.ADD_LEDGER_ACCESS_KEY: You will need to verify the public key information on your Ledger device.
ledgerSignTxModal.CREATE_ACCOUNT_FROM_IMPLICIT: You will need to confirm the creation of an account on your Ledger device. This includes the transactions required to transfer balances from a temporary account.
ledgerSignTxModal.CREATE_NEW_ACCOUNT: You will need to confirm adding a key for a new account on your Ledger device.
ledgerSignTxModal.DELETE_RECOVERY_METHOD: You will need to confirm the details to delete the key on your Ledger device.
ledgerSignTxModal.DISABLE_LEDGER: You will need to verify the public key information on your Ledger device.
ledgerSignTxModal.GET_LEDGER_PUBLIC_KEY: You will need to confirm access to the public key on your Ledger device.
ledgerSignTxModal.REMOVE_ACCESS_KEY: You will need to verify the details to remove the key on your Ledger device.
ledgerSignTxModal.REMOVE_NON_LEDGER_ACCESS_KEYS: You will need to verify the details on your Ledger device.
ledgerSignTxModal.SEND_MONEY: You will need to confirm the transfer details on your Ledger device.
ledgerSignTxModal.SET_SIGN_TRANSACTION_STATUS: You will need to confirm the top up information on your Ledger device.
ledgerSignTxModal.SETUP_RECOVERY_MESSAGE: You will need to verify the credentials for full access on your Ledger device.
ledgerSignTxModal.SIGN_AND_SEND_TRANSACTIONS: You will need to confirm the top-up information on your Ledger device.
ledgerSignTxModal.STAKE: You will need to confirm staking on your Ledger device
ledgerSignTxModal.UNSTAKE: You will need to confirm unstaking on your Ledger device
ledgerSignTxModal.WITHDRAW: You will need to confirm the withdrawal to your Ledger device

lockedBalance: These NEARs are locked in a lockup contract and cannot be withdrawn. You can still delegate or stake these NEAR tokens. After the NEARs are unlocked, you can see them on your unlocked balance and withdraw them. (which would mean their transition to the

confirm.pageText: You consent to full access to $ {appTitle}!

details.callFunctions: Call a function in any smart contract
details.noDescription: No description provided for this method

form.thisDoesNotAllow: This will prevent the application from transferring NEAR tokens.

feeAllowance.desc: The application will be given permission to spend up to $ {amount} NEAR towards network fees incurred during use.

fullAccessModal.desc: Proceed with caution. Full access permissions allow contracts and applications to access your token balance. To confirm, enter your account ID below.
fullAccessModal.title: Grant full account access?

connectConfirm.fullAccessWarning: This site is requesting full access to your account. To enable full access, you'll be asked to verify your account ID.

permissions.notTransferTokens: This does not allow the app to transfer tokens
permissions.viewAddress: View the address of your permitted account
permissions.viewBalance: View the balance of your permitted account

connectConfirm.title: Connecting with:

connectWithNear.desc: An application is requesting $ {accessType} to your NEAR account. Select the account you wish to connect.
connectWithNear.title: Connect with NEAR

minimumBalance: The minimum NEAR balance that an account must hold in order for it to remain active. This balance represents the cost of maintaining storage for your NEAR blockchain account (with a small margin), and may rise or fall. depending on whether the account requires more or less space.

importCode.desc: If you are already logged in on a desktop device, scan your mobile access code to import your account.

showCode.desc: Scan your mobile access code to grant full account access to your mobile device.

modal.desc: Reveal and scan the QR code below to import your account on your mobile device.
modal.disclaimer: This code contains highly sensitive data and grants full account access to your mobile device. Take care not to share or expose it, and only import your account to a secure device that you own.
modal.title: Mobile Access Code

networkBanner.desc: This wallet (and network) is only available for testing purposes. Tokens and other assets have no value. Created accounts will not be transferred to the Mainnet.
networkBanner.title: Test wallet

noNode.text: This will connect your node to your wallet account.
noNode.title: Do you already have a configured site? Add it here.

one.desc: Instructions are available in the documentation
one.title: 1. Install and Run the Node via CLI

three.desc: Staking from here or via the CLI. You can refer to the documentation for help.
three.title: 3. Start staking

steps.title: To start a node or staking, do the following:

two.desc: An unsynchronized node cannot produce or validate blocks
two.title: 2. Wait for the node to sync

lockPopup.text: Your username is your unique identifier in the system and cannot be changed as the data and ownership of the assets are linked to it. However, you can $ {link} with your desired name and submit assets as needed.
lockPopup.title: Why is this blocked?

details.qrDesc: Use your phone camera to send to this address

lockupBanner.title: $ {amount} are available for withdrawal from your lockup contract!

security.lessSecureDesc: These options are recommended for accounts with small amounts of NEAR and other assets. They are convenient, but pose additional risk compared to more secure options. If your email or SMS is compromised, your funds could be compromised. threat.
security.mostSecureDesc: Ledger is the most secure option. The mnemonic phrase remains safe if used correctly (must be recorded and stored in a safe place).
security.title: Security and Recovery

profile.twoFactorDesc: Authentication via SMS or email when authorizing transactions and / or logging into your account.

reCAPTCHA.disclaimer: This site is protected by reCAPTCHA and the Google Privacy Policy and Terms of Service apply.

fail.desc: reCAPTCHA is required in order to authorize new accounts funded by NEAR.
fail.title: Failed to load reCAPTCHA.

recoverAccount.actionRequired: This message contains a magic link. Please follow the link to start the recovery process.
recoverAccount.cannotResend: This message was sent to you while enabling the recovery method via email / SMS. We only send this message once and will not be able to forward it again.

email.desc: Check your email from near.org with the subject line:
email.subject: " Important: Near Wallet Recovery Email \
email.title: Via email

ledger.desc: Make sure your Ledger is securely connected and the NEAR app is running on your device.
ledger.title: Ledger

recoverAccount.pageText: Follow the instructions to begin the access recovery process.

phone.desc: Check your mobile phone for SMS from
phone.title: By mobile phone

phrase.desc: Make sure you have a 12-word recovery mnemonic phrase and then click below to start the recovery process
phrase.title: Using a mnemonic phrase

recoverSeedPhrase.pageText: Enter the backup mnemonic phrase associated with the account.

recoverWithLink.errorP: Please check your email or phone for the most recent message. Links in all previous messages are no longer valid.
recoverWithLink.pTwo: If this is not your default browser, please copy the URL and complete the restore process in your preferred browser.
recoverWithLink.title: Account Recovery

recoveryMgmt.disableNotAllowed: Accounts require at least one active restore method. Please enable alternative restore method to proceed.
recoveryMgmt.disableTextLink: The magic link you received will be permanently deactivated.
recoveryMgmt.disableTextPhrase: Your current mnemonic phrase will be permanently disabled.
recoveryMgmt.disableTitle: Are you sure you want to disable this method?
recoveryMgmt.noRecoveryMethod: You do not have any methods available to recover your account, please add one of the methods below.
recoveryMgmt.title: Recovery method

ADD_ACCESS_KEY.error: An error occurred while confirming this action. Please try again!
ADD_ACCESS_KEY.success: $ {title} is now eligible to use your account

ADD_ACCESS_KEY_SEED_PHRASE.error: An error occurred while configuring the mnemonic phrase. Please try again!
ADD_ACCESS_KEY_SEED_PHRASE.success: Recovery mnemonic phrase setup completed successfully.

ADD_LEDGER_ACCOUNT_ID.error:
Access to one of the accounts was denied. Accounts were not restored.
You must authorize read access to each account on your Ledger device to proceed. Please try again.

CHECK_IS_NEW.error: Username is taken. Please try another one.

CHECK_NEW_ACCOUNT.error: Username is taken. Please try another one.

CREATE_NEW_ACCOUNT.error: Username is taken. Please try another one.

default.error: Sorry, an error has occurred. Please try again.

GET_LEDGER_ACCOUNT_IDS.error:
The public key was rejected. Accounts were not restored.
You must give NEAR permission to the wallet to view your public key to continue. Please try again.

RECOVER_ACCOUNT_SEED_PHRASE.success:
Mnemonic phrase recovery completed.
You have successfully restored $ {numberOfAccounts} account (s) .
The last one is selected as active.

REMOVE_ACCESS_KEY.error: Please check the device connection and make sure the NEAR app is open there.

reduxActions.RetriesExceeded: The maximum number of retries for this transaction has been exceeded.

SAVE_AND_SELECT_LEDGER_ACCOUNTS.error: Please check the device connection and make sure the NEAR app is open there.
SAVE_AND_SELECT_LEDGER_ACCOUNTS.success:
You have successfully logged in.
You have successfully restored $ {numberOfAccounts} account (s). The last one is selected as active.

SEND_MONEY.error: Sorry, an error has occurred. Please try again.

SETUP_RECOVERY_MESSAGE.success: The installation of the recovery method is complete.

TRANSFER_ALL_FROM_LOCKUP.error: Something went wrong. Please try again.
TRANSFER_ALL_FROM_LOCKUP.success: You have successfully transferred the tokens from your lockup contract!

reduxActions.U2F_4: Ledger device login failed: U2F DEVICE_INELIGIBLE. Please make sure your Ledger device is connected and unlocked.

VERIFY_TWO_FACTOR.error: Two-factor authentication has not been installed. Please try again.

reservedForFeesInfo: Up to $ {data} NEAR is reserved to cover the cost of transactions.

selectAccountDropdown.switchAccounthNotAllowed: This application does not allow account changes.

amountStatusId.howMuch: How much do you want to send?
amountStatusId.notEnoughTokens: You must leave at least $ {amount} NEAR in your account

banner.insufficient: You are trying to send the entire available balance. At least $ {data} NEAR must be reserved to cover transaction fees.
banner.useMax: A small portion ($ {data} NEAR) of the available balance has been reserved to cover transaction fees.

sendMoney.onceConfirmed: It will be impossible to cancel the transaction!

subtitle.default: Enter the number of NEAR tokens to send and the recipient's account name.

success.title:
Transaction complete!
You sent $ {amount}

translateIdInfoTooltip.estimatedFees: The estimated cost of processing your transaction.
translateIdInfoTooltip.estimatedTotal: The estimated total of your transaction including fees.
translateIdInfoTooltip.networkFees: The final amount paid to cover the costs of processing your transaction.
translateIdInfoTooltip.reservedForFees: The portion of your account balance that cannot be spent. This amount is reserved to cover the storage costs of your account. For more information, visit our documentation.

setRecoveryConfirm.pageText: We sent a 6-digit verification code to

one.email: If you did not receive this email or the email address above is incorrect,
one.phoneNumber: If you have not received this SMS or the phone number above is incorrect,

two.email: to re-enter your email address and send your message.
two.phoneNumber: to re-enter the phone number and send the message.

setRecoveryConfirm.title: Enter confirmation code

setupLedger.one: Connect the Ledger Nano S to your computer or mobile device via USB and open the NEAR app .
setupLedger.two: If you haven't installed the NEAR app on your Ledger yet, follow

setupLedgerSteps.five: Follow the instructions to install the NEAR app to your device.
setupLedgerSteps.four: Return to the Manager tab and search for NEAR .
setupLedgerSteps.header: Install NEAR on your Ledger device
setupLedgerSteps.one: Open Ledger Live, install any available firmware updates.
setupLedgerSteps.three: Go to Experimental Features , and make sure Developer Mode ( Developer Mode ) was enabled .
setupLedgerSteps.two: Go to Settings ( Settings ).

setupLedgerSuccess.header: Ledger is verified in your account!

one.keep: Using multiple recovery methods and devices increases the vulnerability of your account.
one.remove: Before deleting existing keys and recovery methods, make sure you record and securely retain the original Ledger mnemonic phrase.

two.remove: If you lose access to your original mnemonic phrase, NEAR Inc. will not be able to assist you in recovering your account and funds.

setupLedgerSuccess.one: We recommend that you delete all existing keys (recovery methods and devices).
setupLedgerSuccess.primaryCta: Remove existing keys and recovery methods
setupLedgerSuccess.two: Using multiple keys and recovery methods (including mnemonic phrases) increases the vulnerability of your account.

setupRecovery.advancedSecurityDesc: Write down a 12-word phrase and store it securely.
setupRecovery.basicSecurityDesc: Enter your email or phone number to get the magic link
setupRecovery.notSupportedPhone: Sorry, we cannot provide SMS service in your area. Please select a recovery method via email.
setupRecovery.phoneDesc: Enter your phone number below and get a magic recovery link

setupSeedPhrase.pageText: Write down the following words in order and store them in a safe place. You cannot recover your account without them!

setupSeedPhraseSuccess.pageText: Use the recovery phrase to restore your account.
setupSeedPhraseSuccess.pageTextSecondLine: Anyone with access to your recovery phrase can access your funds, keep it safe!

setupSeedPhraseVerify.pageText: Enter the next word from the recovery phrase to complete the installation process.

ActionWarrning.deleteAccount: You are about to delete your account! Your NEAR balance will be destroyed and all your account information will be deleted.
ActionWarrning.deployContract: You are about to deploy a contract to your account! This contract can access your NEAR balance and interact with other contracts on your behalf.
ActionWarrning.functionCall: No description specified for this function.
ActionWarrning.stake: You are about to stake your NEAR tokens. These tokens will be locked and may be lost if your validator stops responding.

sign.hereAreSomeDetails: Here are some details to help you.

firefoxBanner.desc: Ledger is currently only supported in Mozilla Firefox . Support for other browsers will soon be restored.

modal.ledgerMustAdd: The ledger must add an access key to every account protected by your given device:

signInLedger.one: Make sure your Ledger is securely connected and the NEAR app is running on your device.

stagingBanner.desc: Attention: This is a preliminary version of the NEAR wallet. It may contain errors and these errors may lead to loss of funds. By continuing to use this version, you agree that you understand and accept these risks, and you also understand that the NEAR wallet team cannot help you.
stagingBanner.title: Warning: This is a preliminary version of the wallet. Use at your own risk!

stakedBalance: These NEARs are actively used to support the validator and secure the network. When you decide to unstake these NEARs, it will take some time for it to appear in your Available Balance, as NEAR requires 4 epochs (~ 52-65 hours) to withdraw tokens from staking.

alertBanner.title: Before staking a new validator in the pool, you must first unstake your current validator tokens and take them out of the pool.

available.info: These tokens have been removed from staking and can now be withdrawn.
available.title: Available for output

farm.info: This is project validator. You’ll get the farming reward while staking on it.
farm.title: Total token earned

pending.info: These tokens have been withdrawn from staking, but cannot be withdrawn yet. Tokens take 52 to 65 hours to withdraw from staking.
pending.title: Withdrawal pending

staked.info: What is the total staking size?
staked.title: Total staking size

unclaimed.info: Rewards that have been earned but have not yet been withdrawn. Unclaimed rewards are automatically sent to restake, which means that your total staking size will automatically increase over time, and your rewards are mutilated by compound interest .
unclaimed.title: Unclaimed Awards

unavailable.modalDescOne: We cannot calculate rewards at this time if 2FA is enabled. We hope to enable this feature in the near future.
unavailable.modalDescTwo: At the same time, you can see how your rewards are accumulating in the Total Staking Size section. This balance will grow while your tokens are staked as the rewards received are automatically sent to the current validator's staking pool.
unavailable.modalTitle: Unable to display staking rewards received
unavailable.title: Unable to display received awards.

noValidators.title: You do not currently have staking in the pool of any validator.

staking.pageText: Configure your node through the CLI, then add it here.

stake.accounts: If you have locked NEAR tokens, you can stake them using a NEAR lockup contract (lockup.near) or an unlocked NEAR contract (your account name). You will only see the staking amount for the selected account. . If you do not have blocked NEAR tokens, you can ignore this section

banner.insufficientBalance: You are trying to stake all available balances. At least $ {data} NEAR must be reserved to cover transaction fees.
banner.stakeMax: A small portion ($ {data} NEAR) of the available balance has been set aside to cover transaction fees.

stake.desc: Enter the staking size that will be delegated to the selected validator.
stake.ledgerDisclaimer: Note: Since this is the first time you are staking tokens to this validator, you will need to confirm 2 transactions.
stake.title: Staking size

stakeSuccess.desc: Your staking has been successfully submitted for delegation to the selected validator:
stakeSuccess.descTwo: You can view your delegation and staking rewards in the staking dashboard.
stakeSuccess.title: Done!

staking.desc: Stake NEAR tokens to the validator
staking.noValidators: You have not started staking in the validator pool yet.
staking.title: Staking

unstake.beforeUnstakeDisclaimer: Unstaked tokens will become available after ~ 52-65 hours (4 epochs).
unstake.desc: Enter the number of tokens you would like to be staked from the current validator.
unstake.title: Withdraw tokens from staking

unstakeSuccess.desc: Your staking of $ {amount} has been successfully retrieved from the pool of the selected validator:
unstakeSuccess.descTwo: Your tokens are pending withdrawal from staking and will become available for withdrawal after ~ 52-65 hours (4 epochs).
unstakeSuccess.title: Done!

validator.desc: This commission is paid to the staking validator on your behalf. Commission is imposed on your rewards only.
validator.title:
Validator:
@ $ {validator}
validator.withdrawalDisclaimer: Tokens will become available for withdrawal after waiting period for exit from staking, which takes ~ 52-65 hours (4 epochs)

desc.account: Enter the name of an existing validator for staking your NEAR tokens.
desc.lockup: Enter the name of an existing validator for staking your NEAR tokens. You can only stake one selected validator in the pool at a time.

validators.inputLabel: Enter the name of the validator pool
validators.title: Select a validator

stakingPoolUnstaked: These NEARs are currently in the staking pool, but not staking. For example, they may be in a unstacked state, pending a withdrawal operation.

topLevelAccounts.body: Account names are like domain names. Only the $ {data} account can create accounts like yourname. $ {data}, and only yourname. $ {data} can create app.yourname. $ { data} All accounts created in this wallet use. $ {data} Top Level Accounts (TLA) To learn more about account names and create your own top level account, read the documentation docs .

totalBalance: The total balance shows all the NEAR tokens under your control. In many cases, you will not have immediate access to all of the contents of the total balance (for example, if it is locked, delegated, or staked). Check your Available Balance

alertBanner.title: $ {data} will be blocked to cover the cost of keeping the 2FA contract as long as it is enabled.

twoFactor.desc: Protect your account by requiring mandatory email or SMS confirmation of all transactions requiring authorization.

disable.desc: Please note that once disabled, transactions will not require 2FA confirmation.
disable.title: Are you sure you want to disable 2FA?

twoFactor.notEnoughBalance: To enable 2FA, your account requires a minimum balance of $ {amount}
twoFactor.promptDesc: We highly recommend setting up a two-factor authentication method to increase the security of your account and available funds
twoFactor.subHeader: Two factor authentication adds an extra layer of security to your account. Passphrase and Ledger keys continue to allow full access to your account.
twoFactor.title: Two-factor authentication

title.desc: A 6-digit verification code has been sent to:
title.title: Enter a two-factor verification code

unlockedAvailTransfer: These NEAR tokens are unlocked and can be withdrawn from your lockup contract.
unlockedBalance: These NEAR tokens are still in the lockup contract, but they are unlocked.
unvestedBalance: These NEARs are reserved for you, but are not yet in your ownership. You can still delegate or stake them and the rewards will be yours. Once you own these NEARs, they will appear on your locked or unlocked balance.

addAccessKey.error:
An error has occurred.
To access your account, please enter the mnemonic phrase from the previous step below.

addAccessKeySeedPhrase.errorSecond:
An error has occurred.
The mnemonic phrase has not been added to your account. Please try again.

addLedgerAccountId.errorRpc: An error occurred while recovering your account.

getLedgerAccountIds.noAccounts: No account has been associated with this Ledger. You must first create an account and then use the Ledger to log in.
getLedgerAccountIds.U2FNotSupported: U2F support in the browser is required to use the Ledger device. Please use Chrome, Opera or Firefox with the U2F extension.

lockup.transferAllWithStakingPoolBalance: Remove from staking and withdraw all funds from the staking pool before transferring the remaining balance of the lockup contract to the Near wallet.

promptTwoFactor.userCancelled: The 2FA code was not verified correctly.

recoverAccountSeedPhrase.errorInvalidSeedPhrase: No accounts matched the given mnemonic phrase.

recoveryMethods.lastMethod: Unable to delete your last recovery method. While you are using Ledger, you need to keep at least one recovery method in order to ensure that your account can be restored.
recoveryMethods.setupMethod: An error has occurred. Please check your recovery method.

setupRecoveryMessage.error: An error occurred while installing the recovery method. Please try again.

staking.noLockup: No lockup contract was found in this account
staking.noWithdraw: Pending balance cannot be withdrawn from the validator
